captions.text: - That is disgusting, can you please go

- Why? I don't wanna
miss the dessert round.
- No, you do this all the time,
and I am constantly finding pie--
- I don't know where that went.

- ♫ How wonderful life is ♫
- ♫ How wonderful life is ♫

- ♫ Now you're in my world ♫
- ♫ Now you're in the world ♫

My world! It's my world.
- No, no it is...
Don't give him that, his stomach can't
- Oh, he's a cat, he's fine.
You know where I saw this earlier?
- Oh yeah, I needed to scrub it.
- Yeah, but I just found it in the sink.
- I needed to do dishes after.
If it touched soap that means it's clean.
- You can't just make up your own rules
to suit you as we play the game.
- Well stop taking the fun out of it then.
- I'm not taking the fun out of it!

What takes the fun out
of it is when you cheat.
- You left the toilet seat up.

- Oh, it's not that big of
a deal, just put it down.
We're not made of money you know?
Remember that time you threw up?

title: More Weird Things All Couples Fight About

comments.author: Psybur

comments.text:
+galigalileagali
Bacteria's already in the air if there are odors in the restroom or 
bathroom.  Wherever there's an odor of poo, pee or whatever, the molecules 
and bacteria have already entered into your nose & sinuses and are on you.  
Flushing with the lid down or up makes no difference.  What's in the toilet 
bowl water will get flushed down, and what's in the air isn't going to get 
sucked down into the toilet drain, so it doesn't matter.
comments.author: StrixNoctis

comments.text:
I expect my boyfriend to put both the seat and lid down because I don't 
want my cats drinking out of the toilet. Also if you leave the lid up when 
you flush bacteria gets everywhere
comments.author: galigalileagali

comments.text:
+Olivia
I do because I once saw a spider on the side of the bowl of a toilet.  I'm 
surprised if nobody else is as cautious or doesn't care if they get bitten, 
but then I'm aware a lot of people are lazy especially here in the USA.

Also, why do you expect males to leave the seat down for you if you're not 
going to likewise leave the seat up for men?  It makes more sense for you 
to just put the seat down yourself if it's up and you need it down.  Nobody 
can predict if a male or female is going to need to use the toilet next nor 
whether a male is going to poop or pee until the time comes.

Don't expect all men to be servile toward you women because men aren't on 
this planet to serve women, and only the silly ones who are stupidly 
desperate for women take self-centered commands from women.
comments.author: StrixNoctis
